it.polimi.se2019.card.powerup

Class PowerUpCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.card.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.card.powerup.PowerUpCard

  • public class PowerUpCard
extends Card
    Defines a powerupcard. It is a sublcass of card, it needs the specification of parameters like ID, script, color, use, scriptExectuor, and a boolean value that indicates if it is used or not.
